userId.description: The ID of the user the todo belongs to, if a user

teamName.description: The team the todo belongs to, if a team

stateMachineTitle.description: The title of the state-machine that the todo entry is associated with - use when rendering a UI to group related todo-entries into groups

stateMachineCategory.description: To be used to help style categorise/style todo list entries - this is the category name of the state-machine that the todo entry is associated with

todoTitle.description: A specific title to identify each todo entry

requiredHumanInput.description: The type of UI component that will need rendering if the user wants to progress this todo entry (either form or board)

launches.description: A standard launches object which can be used to offer alternative actions to the user instead of the default behaviour of progressing it (e.g. perhaps allocating it to another user or team... or just viewing a related board).
